result.ponchtml: Tá aiféala orm aċ ní féidir liom tíoċtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.

result.eng: I am from Cork originally but I live in Dublin now.
result.ga: Is as Corcaigh ó dhúchas mé ach tá mé i mo chónaí i mBaile Átha Cliath anois

result.eng: But it's nice to meet new people, too.

result.eng: I'm sorry but I'm working tonight.

result.html: Tá brón orm ach tá mé ag obair anochtI'm sorry but I'm working tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm aċ tá mé ag obair anoċtI'm sorry but I'm working tonight.

result.eng: I'd love to but  I'll be working late.
result.ga: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanach
result.orig: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanach
result.html: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanachI'd love to but I'll be working late.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá liom aċ beiḋ mé ag obair déanaċI'd love to but I'll be working late.

result.eng: I'm from New York but I live in Cork now.

result.eng: It's beside the sea but close to the city as well.

result.eng: I was married but I'm divorced now.
result.ga: Bhí mé pósta ach tá mé colscartha anois

result.html: Bhí mé pósta ach tá mé colscartha anoisI was married but I'm divorced now.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé pósta aċ tá mé colscarṫa anoisI was married but I'm divorced now.

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ga: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois

result.eng: Two of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ga: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag

result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ċeann acu an-ṁór aċ tá an ceann eile an-ḃeagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.

result.eng: I have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ga: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ga: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó

result.eng: The pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ga: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.orig: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte

result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ an píolóta sa ċloigeann aċ ṫuirling an t-eitleán slán sáḃailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo

result.eng: She nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ga: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.orig: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.html: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.

result.eng: I love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ga: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.orig: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.html: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ponchtml: Tá grá agam do ḋroiċid aċ níorḃ é seo fáṫ mo ċuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.

result.eng: But he survived the war.
result.ga: Ach tháinig sé slán as an gcogadh
result.orig: Ach tháinig sé slán as an gcogadh
result.html: Ach tháinig sé slán as an gcogadhBut he survived the war.
result.ponchtml: Aċ ṫáinig sé slán as an gcogaḋBut he survived the war.

result.eng: But that was not the end of the story.
result.ga: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.orig: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.html: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
result.ponchtml: Aċ níorḃ ẛin é deireaḋ an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu

result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.orig: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith

result.ponchtml: Aċ tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léaṁ tearc go maiṫBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.
result.ga: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo

result.html: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seoBut many of them look tired now.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá cuma spíonta ar ċuid ṁór acu fán tráṫ seoBut many of them look tired now.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!

result.eng: But competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ga: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol

result.ponchtml: Aċ ḃí an comórtas géar idir na soláṫróirí agus ḃí na brabaiġ caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!
result.ga: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann
result.orig: Ach eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snámh san aois a bhfuil sé ann

result.ponchtml: Aċ eisean ag cur bádaí beaga ar snáṁ san aois a ḃfuil sé annBut him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: But what am I saying?
result.ga: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caint
result.orig: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caint
result.html: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caintBut what am I saying?
result.ponchtml: Aċ cá ḃfuil mé ag caintBut what am I saying?

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ga: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.orig: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.html: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ponchtml: Tá ár gcluasa boḋraiṫe aige agus gan as a ḃéal aċ BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.

result.eng: We may be related but we are not alike.
result.ga: Más gaolmhar ní cosúil
result.orig: Más gaolmhar ní cosúil
result.html: Más gaolmhar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.
result.ponchtml: Más gaolṁar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.html: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
